title: Metaheuristic for Exam Timetabling Problem at universities
description: Implementing research insights using ORIE ideas to solve the infamous NP-hard exam timetabling problem for Cornell University.

title: Pacman with GUI, ADT's, and Dijkstra's
description: Dijkstra's helps implement the shortest path algorithm for the ghost navigation in this game enabled by Java's GUI library.

title: Food Delivery Program Using Minimum Spanning Tree
tags: Operations Research, Greedy, Data Structures, API's
description: Traveling Salesman simplified. Using MST, find the most cost-efficient way to deliver food to all destinations given a starting point, factoring in distance, elevation change, congestion, and other real world data using the Google Maps API
